content:
Hello!
I have a PR (#12519) which depends on three others. Two of them were merged, so I got merge conflicts and to solve them I merged the corresponding branches, therefore the changes made by these old PRs still appear in #12519. Should I leave it like this, or should I merge master into my branch (or do something else)?
You should merge master into the branch of the PR
Etienne Marion has marked this topic as resolved.
